alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:19PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Hamilton County through 300 PM EDT... At 219 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Walden, or near Chattanooga, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Soddy-Daisy, Signal Mountain, Walden, Lakesite, Ridgeside, Fairmount, Harrison, Red Bank and Collegedale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
